entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:27 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -16.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 2:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -16.6°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -18.7°C
Wind: NW 41 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
